General.Name: IMC Exploration Group Public Limited Company
General.Description: IMC Exploration Group Public Limited Company explores for gold, silver, zinc, and other minerals primarily in Ireland. The company's primary projects include Avoca Mine and the north Wexford gold project. IMC Exploration Group Public Limited Company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

1.Name: Mr. Andrew  Fleming BSc, H.Dip. Ed., P. Geo
1.Title: Exec. Director
